T02D2894:244a-1: badzra p'a ni mandal bi dhi /
T02D2894:244a-3: phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga //
T02D2894:244a-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2894:244a-5: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02D2894:244a-6: bla ma la gus phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2894:244a-7: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2894:244a-8: de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga brtsam //
T02D2894:244a-9: dpal phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod pa'i don du /
T02D2894:244a-10: dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2894:244a-11: de la sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni /
T02D2894:244a-12: sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du /
T02D2894:244a-14: snying po 'bum bzlas par bya ba'am /
T02D2894:244a-15: yang na ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi bar
T02D2894:244b-0: de srid kyi bar du bsgom pa dang @244b bzlas
T02D2894:244b-1: pa bya'o // de ni sngon du bsnyen pa byed pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2894:244b-2: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs nas /
T02D2894:244b-6: nags tshal la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su sa bslang ba dang /
T02D2894:244b-9: sa byin gyis brlab bar bya ste /
T02D2894:244b-14: gnas kyi bdag po la bslang ba ni /
T02D2894:244b-15: mandal dang dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu byas te /
T02D2894:244b-18: aom bi ti bam sa a'a k'arsha ya dza: bya ba dang /
T02D2894:244b-19: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis brkyang pas la reg par byas pas /
T02D2894:244b-20: sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa /
T02D2894:244b-21: sa'i lha mo la mchod pa dang /
T02D2894:244b-22: de'i 'khor la gtor ma byin la /
T02D2894:244b-23: gsol ba gdab bar bya ste /
T02D2894:244b-24: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2894:244b-25: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D2894:244b-26: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2894:244b-27: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2894:244b-28: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2894:244b-29: ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar //
T02D2894:244b-30: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyis sde //
T02D2894:244b-32: zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod la /
T02D2894:244b-33: byon par bsams te mchod la gshegs su gsol /
T02D2894:244b-34: de nas sbyang ba'i phyir drag po dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D2894:244b-35: 'dom gang nye 'khor du lte ba nub tsam ma /
T02D2894:244b-36: pus mo nub tsam brkos la gseg ma dang gyo mo dang /
T02D2894:244b-37: rus pa la sogs pa bsal te /
T02D2894:244b-39: sa de nyid kyis bkang nas sa'i ltas brtag par bya ste /
T02D2894:244b-41: de'i rjes las gzung ba ni /
T02D2894:244b-43: bla re la sogs pa bres la /
T02D2894:244b-45: phyogs bzhir spos rgyun mi 'chad par btul bar bya'o //
T02D2894:244b-46: de nas lag pa g-yas pa der gtugs te /
T02D2894:244b-47: yi ge brgya pa lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2894:244b-48: sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2894:244b-49: sa gzung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ste /
T02D2894:244b-51: de nas khrus bya zhing dris byugs la gos sngon
T02D2894:245a-0: po'i stod g-yog sa bgos la rgyan gdags @245a *
T02D2894:245a-1: // shing dang rdo rje dang dril bur ldan pas /
T02D2894:245a-2: gal te nus na smyung bar gnas pa dang /
T02D2894:245a-3: ma nus na zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2894:245a-4: de la re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02D2894:245a-7: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2894:245a-8: de la yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2894:245a-9: rdo rje chen po nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i khong stong bsam pa ni srung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D2894:245a-10: de'i steng du bhr'um las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi ba rta babs dang bcas pa bskyed pa /
T02D2894:245a-11: dbus su aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2894:245a-12: de nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la /
T02D2894:245a-13: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D2894:245a-15: yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i bar du byas la lha mo mchod nas /
T02D2894:245a-17: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D2894:245a-18: mig g-yas par ma las nyi ma /
T02D2894:245a-19: g-yon par ta dang aa las zla ba /
T02D2894:245a-20: rkang mthil du aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed nas langs te /
T02D2894:245a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas /
T02D2894:245a-22: bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal gsal bar byas nas /
T02D2894:245a-23: dbus kyi gtso bo nam mkhar bteg la khro bo'i bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2894:245a-25: chos dbyings stong pa gnyis med dang nyid las //
T02D2894:245a-26: 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong zhing //
T02D2894:245a-27: thabs la mkhas pas 'jigs byed skur ston pa //
T02D2894:245a-28: khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2894:245a-29: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
T02D2894:245a-30: dpa' bo'i stang stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
T02D2894:245a-31: nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis //
T02D2894:245a-32: bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2894:245a-33: ces brjod nas bka' bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D2894:245a-34: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i lha
T02D2894:245a-35: la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig / da
T02D2894:245a-37: bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin 'byer bar gyis //
T02D2894:245a-38: ci ste da yi bka' las 'das gyur na //
T02D2894:245a-39: ye shes can gyi rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis //
T02D2894:245a-40: spyi bo tshal ba brgyar ni rab 'gems shing //
T02D2894:245b-0: rnam @245b par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02D2894:245b-2: deng rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug che ge mo zhes bya bas /
T02D2894:245b-3: slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba /
T02D2894:245b-4: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2894:245b-5: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D2894:245b-6: thob par bya ba'i phyir dpal phyag na rdo rje
T02D2894:245b-7: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po zhig rtsom gyis
T02D2894:245b-8: / gang su yang rung bas phyogs 'di nas gnas
T02D2894:245b-9: pa'i lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang
T02D2894:245b-10: / srin po dang / yi dags dang /
T02D2894:245b-11: sha za dang brjed byed dang 'byung po dang /
T02D2894:245b-12: nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang /
T02D2894:245b-13: rig 'dzin la sogs pa rgan po dang /
T02D2894:245b-14: rgan mo g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams /
T02D2894:245b-15: 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs shig / de
T02D2894:245b-16: ltar phyag na rdo rje'i bka' thos pas myur ba
T02D2894:245b-17: nyid du dengs shig / gang dag mi 'gro ba
T02D2894:245b-18: de dag ni // de'i ye shes kyi rdo rje
T02D2894:245b-19: chen po kun du 'bar ba 'dis mgo bo tshal
T02D2894:245b-21: h'um zhes lan gsum brjod de /
T02D2894:245b-22: rdo rje chen po'i gar dang /
T02D2894:245b-23: rdo rje'i 'gros kyis sa gzhi lan gsum bskor zhing /
T02D2894:245b-24: rang gi lus la khro bo'i tshogs phyung la /
T02D2894:245b-25: sdang pa thams cad bskrad par bsam mo //
T02D2894:245b-26: de nas yi ge h'um gis srung ba'i 'khor lo byas la /
T02D2894:245b-27: phur bu lnga stong phyag na rdo rje smad do rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bskyed nas //
T02D2894:245b-28: aom badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sarba bi gh'am bandha h'um phat /
T02D2894:245b-29: ces bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D2894:245b-31: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'a na phat /
T02D2894:245b-32: k'i l'a ya k'i l'a ya sarba p'a bam phat /
T02D2894:245b-33: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya badzra
T02D2894:245b-34: dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya w'a
T02D2894:245b-35: ka tsitta badzra k'i l'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2894:245b-37: aom badzra mungkar a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02D2894:245b-39: de nas srung skud bcing ba dang /
T02D2894:245b-40: gu gul gyis bdugs pa dang /
T02D2894:245b-41: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing dri'i thig le byas na /
T02D2894:245b-42: byams pa'i go cha bskon par bya'o //
T02D2894:245b-43: de nas dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2894:245b-44: snying po bzlas pa'i dra'i chus byugs la /
T02D2894:245b-45: dbus su dri'i thig le bya'o //
T02D2894:245b-46: me tog gi tshom bu bkram nas /
T02D2894:245b-47: dza:h'um bam ho:'i sngags kyis bteg pa'i lha bzhugs su gsol la /
T02D2894:245b-48: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D2894:246a-0: yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs la @246a * //
T02D2894:246a-3: bstod pa byas nas snyan gsan dbab par bya'o //
T02D2894:246a-4: phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2894:246a-5: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2894:246a-6: slob ma kun la brtse ba dang //
T02D2894:246a-7: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2894:246a-9: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02D2894:246a-10: de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
T02D2894:246a-11: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya ste /
T02D2894:246a-13: de nas 'byor pa yod na sbyin sreg gi mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2894:246a-14: de nas gtor ma'i cho gnas 'byung ba bzhin du gtor ma btang nas /
T02D2894:246a-15: slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D2894:246a-17: me tog lag na thogs te /
T02D2894:246a-18: slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas /
T02D2894:246a-19: gsol ba btab ste rgyun bshags byas te /
T02D2894:246a-20: de nas lhar bskyed nas mchod pa byas te /
T02D2894:246a-24: zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad par bya ste /
T02D2894:246a-25: rgyas par ni bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa'i cho ga las shes par bya'o //
T02D2894:246a-26: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o /
T02D2894:246a-28: // / de ltar lhag par gnas pa byas nas /
T02D2894:246a-29: nang par nyi ma shar pa dang /
T02D2894:246a-30: mchod pa bshams la dkyil 'khor nam mkhar bteg ste /
T02D2894:246a-31: sa gzhi pa'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2894:246a-33: thig byin gyis brlabs la cho ga bzhin du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2894:246a-34: de nas tshon dgye bar bya ste /
T02D2894:246a-35: tshon byin gyis brlabs la dbus su padma dang zla
T02D2894:246a-36: ba'i gdan la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri ba
T02D2894:246a-37: dang / phyogs kyi rim par tshon dgye pa dang /
T02D2894:246a-38: rtsig pa la phyi rol dkar po dang /
T02D2894:246a-43: kha khyer dmar po rin po che pha gu ser po dang /
T02D2894:246a-44: dra ba dra phyed nag po /
T02D2894:246a-45: rta babs ci mdzes par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2894:246a-47: dgongs ka'i dus su mchod pa'i rdzas rnams bsags nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D2894:246a-48: lha'i nga rgyal gyis dkyil 'khor bteg la yid kyis dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs te /
T02D2894:246a-49: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2894:246a-51: de nas me tog gi phreng ba dor la slar rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2894:246a-52: de nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la /
T02D2894:246b-0: mdun gyi lha yang yi ge @246b yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje /
T02D2894:246b-1: de la 'od zer spro bsdu byas nas /
T02D2894:246b-2: lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la
T02D2894:246b-3: sogs pa rdzogs par byas nas mchod pa rgyas pa
T02D2894:246b-4: dbul bar bya'o // bstod pa byas nas bum pa bcug ste /
T02D2894:246b-5: bzlas pa byas nas chur bzhu la sku khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2894:246b-6: de nas sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
T02D2894:246b-7: gtor ma btang nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2894:246b-8: de la dang por gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D2894:246b-12: lhar bskyed cing las thams cad pa'i bum pas sku khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2894:246b-14: lha'i dam tshig bsgrags pa dang /
T02D2894:246b-15: slob dpon gyi dam tshig bsgrags pa dang /
T02D2894:246b-23: ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2894:246b-24: de nas sku gsung thugs kyi brtul zhugs dang /
T02D2894:246b-26: ye shes la sogs pa'i dbang dang /
T02D2894:246b-28: brtul zhugs kyi dbang la sogs pa bya'o /
T02D2894:246b-31: dge ba gang nges thob pa kun //
T02D2894:246b-32: phyag na rdo rje thob nas ni //
T02D2894:246b-33: 'gro don du ma byed par shog / phyag na
T02D2894:246b-34: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / slob dpon
